ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && IsConverted && LegacyLead__c = false && ISBLANK( OW_parent_lead__c ) && ConvertedDate > DATE(2021,09,15) && ConvertedOpportunityId == null
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must create an opportunity when converting a lead.
